name: WikiFolderUpdaterTask
friendlyName: Git based WIKI Folder Updater from Black Marble
description: A tools to update or create a set of files in a folder in WIKI based in a Git repo
author: Richard Fennell

inputs.name: repo
inputs.label: Repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: The repo URL to clone e.g dev.azure.com/richardfennell/Git%20project/_git/Git-project.wiki. See documentation for more details https://github.com/rfennell/AzurePipelines/wiki/WIKI-Updater-Tasks

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Checkout Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the pre-existing branch to checkout prior to committing the change, defaults to empty, so no checkout is done and commits are done to the default 'master' branch

inputs.name: targetFolder
inputs.label: Name of the folder to save files into
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the folder that the files will be uploaded to

inputs.name: replaceFile
inputs.label: Replace the file in the WIKI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Replace the file in the WIKI

inputs.name: appendToFile
inputs.label: Append to end of file in the WIKI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Append to end of file in the WIKI if not replacing file

inputs.name: sourceFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder to copy from $(build.sourcesdirectory)

inputs.name: Filter
inputs.label: File Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: A wildcard expression for the files to upload e.g. **/*.md

inputs.name: tagRepo
inputs.label: Tag the commit
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true a tag will be committed to the repo

inputs.name: tag
inputs.label: Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag text to commit to repo

inputs.name: useAgentToken
inputs.label: Run with Build Agent Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true use the built in agent OAUTH token. OAUTH script access must be enabled for the agent

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password/PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password/PAT for authentication (recommended stored as secret variable)

inputs.name: localpath
inputs.label: The local folder to clone into

inputs.name: injectExtraHeader
inputs.label: Inject credentials via Headers
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true, credentials are passed as a header value. If false, the default, they are passed in te URL. To address #613 which is seen on some on-prem instances

inputs.name: retries
inputs.label: Retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of times to retry if a push fails. After a failed push a pull is run prior to the next attempt
